title: Lesson 3: At the Restaurant
content: Listen to each line of the conversation and choose what it means.

practice.question: What is being said?
options: I would like a cheeseburger and a lemonade.
I want a salad and water.
I’ll have a soup and coffee.
practice.answer: I would like a cheeseburger and a lemonade.

practice.question: What is being said?
options: Certainly. Your order will be ready soon.
practice.answer: Certainly. Your order will be ready soon.
